text: 1980 cover of Socialist Albania The India–Albania Friendship Association was an organisation in India. Moni Guha was one of its founders.Revolutionary Democracy. Public Meeting Held in New Delhi to Commemorate the Life and Work of Comrade Moni Guha (1914 - 2009) The association published Socialist Albania. Some of the organisers of the association later started the periodical Revolutionary Democracy.http://www.revolutionarydemocracy.org/albind/index.htm The organization continued to exist after the fall of socialist rule in Albania, and protested the 1997 military intervention in Albania.http://www.revolutionarydemocracy.org/rdv3n2/handsoff.htm ==References== Category:Albania friendship associations Category:India friendship associations Category:Albania–India relations
